onyomiExamples.meaning: person in charge (of an area of work), person responsible, contact (person)
being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)
someone who supports the same member (of an idol group, etc.) as oneself

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to shoulder, to carry on one's shoulder, to nominate for a position, to choose as a representative, to take (someone) for a ride, to deceive, to take in, to be caught up in superstition
to carry on one's shoulder, to shoulder, to bear, to bear (burden, responsibility, etc.), to take upon oneself
